sentences: Aika Ōno (大野 愛果, Ōno Aika, born September 7, 1977) is a Japanese singer and songwriter.
Many of her songs have been featured in anime shows such as Detective Conan (or Case Closed in the US), MÄR, Golgo 13, Detective School Q and Secret of Cerulean Sand.
Hoshi no Kagayaki yo/Natsu wo Matsu Sail no
Like a Star in the Night ☆
Sora Tobu Ano Shiroi Kumo no
